ai-patthana14.37:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.37:1.1_1: A teaching doesn’t give rise to a cause or reason for this.
ai-patthana14.37:1.1_2: go for refuge to the teaching, or for the sake of refuge, and for the sake of a without cause.
ai-patthana14.37:2.1_0: Again, a teaching doesn’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.37:3.1_0: A teaching gives rise to a refuge, without cause,
ai-patthana14.37:4.1_0: ... five objects the results of the universal objects ...
ai-patthana14.37:5.1_0: A teaching doesn’t give rise to a refuge. With no cause or reason,
ai-patthana14.37:6.1_0: The teaching doesn’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.37:7.1_0: not for the sake of reason or two,
ai-patthana14.37:7.1_1: You’re not reborn in a good place ...
ai-patthana14.37:7.1_3: When they were bathing, they were bathing naked in a definitive ...
ai-patthana14.37:7.1_5: it seems to us when you have excellence
ai-patthana14.37:8.1_0: You should go to the same place as before.
ai-patthana14.37:9.1_0: Also, refuge is the condition for the sake of refuge,
ai-patthana14.37:9.1_1: Also, refuge is a condition for the sake of refuge,
ai-patthana14.37:9.1_2: Also, a good principle, not the cause or condition for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana14.37:10.1_0: Also the Teaching is not the condition for the sake of refuge,
ai-patthana14.37:11.1_0: It is a condition for the refuge, not by way of taking away (good) conduct,
ai-patthana14.37:11.1_1: It is not the condition for the refuge, nor by way of taking away the Dhamma,
ai-patthana14.37:11.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana14.37:12.1_1: Two-five years have been reborn in a place wherever there are seven places, and after the result of his deeds ...
ai-patthana14.37:12.1_2: the four triads associated with the three paths,
ai-patthana14.37:12.1_3: There are seven hundred and seventy migrations
ai-patthana14.37:13.1_0: A condition that is a condition for the taking up practices that is a condition for the object condition for the objection of the later condition. It is a condition for the arising of later condition.
ai-patthana14.37:14.1_0: Again, without a reason, the condition for the objection of principles, the condition for the objection of the law condition.
ai-patthana14.37:14.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana14.37:15.1_0: Not due to reason, or seven considerations,
ai-patthana14.37:15.1_1: You shouldn’t engage in the five kinds of kingship,
ai-patthana14.37:15.1_4: it’s not easy to find a vulnerability.
ai-patthana14.37:18.1_0: (This should be told in full as in the previous discourse.)
